sources.title: Puerto Rican government-debt crisis - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: The Puerto Rican government-debt crisis was a financial crisis affecting the government of Puerto Rico. [a] The crisis began in 2014 when three major credit agencies downgraded several bond issues by Puerto Rico to "junk status" after the government was unable to demonstrate that it could pay its debt.The downgrades, in turn, prevented the government from selling more bonds in the open market.
